member.name: M:EventFully.API.Extensions.SwaggerServiceExtensions.UseSwaggerDocumentation(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Builder.IApplicationBuilder,Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.ApiExplorer.IApiVersionDescriptionProvider)
member.summary: Extends the Swagger Middleware to use the correct, versioned endpoints
member.param: The API version descriptor provider used to enumerate defined API versions.

member.name: T:EventFully.API.SwaggerDefaultValues
member.summary: Represents the Swagger/Swashbuckle operation filter used to document the implicit API version parameter.
member.remarks: This is only required due to bugs in the . Once they are fixed and published, this class can be removed.

member.name: M:EventFully.API.SwaggerDefaultValues.Apply(Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.Swagger.Operation,Swashbuckle.AspNetCore.SwaggerGen.OperationFilterContext)
member.summary: Applies the filter to the specified operation using the given context.
member.param: The operation to apply the filter to.
